definitions.definition: A hard gelatin made by boiling bones and hides, used in solution as an adhesive ; or any sticky adhesive substance.
Anything that binds two things or people together.
A viscid secretion on the surface of certain plants .

main_definition: A hard gelatin made by boiling bones and hides, used in solution as an adhesive ; or any sticky adhesive substance.
secondary_definitions: ( figurative ) Anything that binds two things or people together.
( botany ) A viscid secretion on the surface of certain plants .
